Title: Up in Flames
Plot: After an explosion destroys a crime scene, Carrie's memories become essential to the investigation.
GuestStars: Omar Metwally, Angela Christian, Paul Urcioli, Brad Heberlee, Maury Ginsberg, Chris Bauer, Jose Soto, Eden Marryshow, Chad Lindsey, Adam McNulty, Michael Basile, Chris Barnes, Edwin J. Birmingham, Quinn MColgan
